I am Assistant Professor (RTD-B) at the [Department of Economics, Management and Statistics](https://www.dems.unimib.it/en) of [University of Milano-Bioccca](https://www.unimib.it/). My research is focused on Bayesian nonparametric statistics, covering methodological, computational and applied aspects. For more details, see my [CV](files/RC_cv.pdf).
